name: Overseen
description:
My game for Mini jam 100: Overload.

I really wanted to go for a puzzle with the chess meaning of overload, but the limitation made me go for a boss-fight type of game. So i went with the overload is overloading player with the things to control(3 characters). I  also tried to balance the game, while trying to do chaotic mechanics.

And a few tips: The game has random, but you can play around it(there is random chance of you getting 4 random particles out of 1). You can break incoming particles(except for sword) with pretty muchanything, but you want to collect the arrows,  and the warrior is good for collecting arrows, not only he can collect arrows with a tip of his sword(you need to hit with it first), but also the mage can heal him, if his health is lower than 2. The archer is your only way to attack the boss. The boss has 3 phases after he has 15hp and  10hp left. Also the fireballs can heal him. There is a certain strategy required to win, so have fun.
